https://tmrev.io/movie/15383-Army of Shadows 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aqNZWM9bspt8zaDvVRIRiWxRVJ7.jpg Betrayed by an informant, Philippe Gerbier finds himself trapped in a torturous Nazi prison camp. Though Gerbier escapes to rejoin the Resistance in occupied Marseilles, France, and exacts his revenge on the informant, he must continue a quiet, seemingly endless battle against the Nazis in an atmosphere of tension, paranoia and distrust. Army of Shadows
